LanguageData.ATR_Tier4Android.label: T4 Android
LanguageData.ATR_Tier4Android.description: The pinnacle of known android theory and practice, the class of tier four androids is marked by the possession of a special AI persona core. While these cores are ultratech technology, the chassis and internals are all high spacer technology. \n\nTier four androids are a cut above the rest, and they know it too - ego complexes and disdain toward others are very common amongst them.
LanguageData.ATR_Tier4Android.tools.0.label: right fist
LanguageData.ATR_Tier4Android.tools.1.label: left fist
LanguageData.ATR_Tier4Android.tools.2.label: head
